question.text: Select the incorrect match about evolution.

options.text: Origin of earth:  <math><mtext>4500</mtext></math>  million years ago
Origin of Universe: <math><mtext>20</mtext></math> million years ago
Origin of first cellular form of life:  <math><mtext>2000</mtext></math>  million years ago
Origin of first non-cellular form of life:  <math><mn>3</mn></math>  billion years ago

solution.text: Big Bang theory explains the origin of universe, which occurred about <math><mtext>20 billion</mtext></math> or <math><mtext>20000 million</mtext></math> years ago. The origin of Earth occurred about <math><mtext>4.5 billion</mtext></math> or <math><mtext>4500 million</mtext></math> years ago. The first non cellular form of life was originated about <math><mtext>3 billion</mtext></math> or <math><mtext>3000 million</mtext></math> years ago.
